metadata.reset:
Restores the remote back to a factory
state by removing all memory of shade
and remote pairings from the remote.
1. On the remote, press and hold the
MENU/RIGHT button to enter the menu.
2. Select ZWAVE > RESET.
3. With LIKE NEW? selected, press and
hold the MENU/RIGHT button until the
screen no longer tells you to wait.

Please use this procedure only when the network primary controller is missing or otherwise inoperable
